name: add-list-element-request
description: Request to add one or more elements to a list property.

fields.name: object-identifier
fields.description: The object identifier containing the list property.

fields.name: property-identifier
fields.description: The property identifier of the list.

fields.name: property-array-index
fields.description: Optional array index if the property is an array.

fields.name: list-of-elements
fields.description: The elements to add to the list.
